Dragon and Pride accompany Moon back to her hometown only to find that her father has been killed. Moon begs the abbot to help her get revenge but he turns her down.  When Tiger learns that Moon is to become a Shaolin bride, he is outraged. Before Pride dies he tells Moon to forget about revenge.
